title: Review Another Auditor's Workpapers
description: An audit manager performs a quality review of a junior auditor's workpapers before the audit is finalized.

tasks.description: Review the workpaper to ensure the test procedures performed are sufficient to support the conclusion.
tasks.expected_outcome: The manager assesses the adequacy of the audit work.

tasks.description: Check that all test exceptions have been clearly documented and investigated.
tasks.expected_outcome: The manager verifies the completeness of the documentation.

tasks.description: Leave review notes for the junior auditor, asking them to clarify a point or perform one additional test step.
tasks.expected_outcome: The manager provides feedback for improvement, ensuring the final workpaper is of high quality.
